This feature is configurable and allows organizations to dictate in which threat scenarios they would like end users to receive feedback emails. Once enabled, Microsoft Defender for Office 365 (MDO) will automatically respond to end user submissions based on the investigation verdict and the configured settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Auto-Remediation of Malicious Entity Clusters Identified in Automated Investigation and Response (AIR)
CurrentVersion.description: The feature will expand upon the automated investigation and response (AIR) by enabling AIR to automatically remediate malicious entity clusters. AIR currently recommends actions for SecOps to approve or decline and this enhancement will allow customers to enable auto-remediation to allow AIR to act on recommendations and soft delete messages included in a malicious URL or malicious file cluster.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Hub Analytics for US Government Clouds
CurrentVersion.description: View, Viewer, dwell time and content level analytics aggregated at a SharePoint Hub level. These features are an enhancement to the existing site and page level analytics in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Microsoft Graph connector results merged inline in "All" vertical for GCC and GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Results from external data sources that are ingested with Microsoft Graph connectors will be displayed in the "All" vertical alongside content from Microsoft 365 apps and services for GCC and GCC-High.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
CurrentVersion.description: ,Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Image based theming
CurrentVersion.description: Outlook for Mac will soon support image-based theming, allowing users to choose an image from a selection available in the General settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Updated post type designs in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: The design of the praise, poll, and question post types in Viva Engage are changing to a more streamlined format. Users will retain all the same publishing and engagement features as the previous design. We've made this change to put more emphasis on user content and help with the experience across surfaces.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability for all participants to start collaborative annotations
CurrentVersion.description: All participants in meetings are now able to start collaborative annotations. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Suggested files in chats
CurrentVersion.description: Save time with AI-based file suggestions in chat. As an expansion of suggested replies in chats, Teams uses AI to surface files when it detects in the conversation intent to share a file. Now, users will be able to respond to their chat message and attach a file in one click. Note: The Government clouds release has been delayed. We will add a new roadmap item when appropriate. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Additionally, this feature is only available in the new Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score People Experiences: Organizational Messages for Communication and Content Collaboration
CurrentVersion.description: ,Organizational messages for selected people experience categories in Adoption Score will enable IT admins to help users understand how to get more from Microsoft 365 using targeted in-product notifications. We will be releasing new organizational messages for Communication and Content Collaboration experiences, backed by Microsoft's commitment to user level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Tenant Allow/Block List Limit per SKU
CurrentVersion.description: Today, customers can only create 500 block and 500 allow entries in sender, URL and file category in Tenant allow/block list. Going ahead, customers with MDO P2 or E5 security can create 5000 allows and 10000 blocks in Tenant allow/block list for sender, URL and file category. Spoof in Tenant allow/block list will remain unaffected by this change and all SKUs will have 1024 entries for both allows and blocks.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customization for Watermark (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams meeting organizers now have the
flexibility to choose between a Single watermark or a repeated watermark. The
Single watermark will display the viewer's email on top of the shared content
and/or video feed in a clean and unobtrusive manner. When the Single watermark
option is enabled via Meeting options, the watermark will be enforced for all
meeting attendees.
